title: Once Upon A Reality: Twisted spins on the classics
description: What happens when fairy tales get real?  Giant with Three Golden Hairs The Six Swans The Little Match Girl Puss in Boots Snow White and Red Rose Pinocchio Hansel and Gretel  A contemporary, adult take on the classics like you've never seen them before... Things are about to get real - and twisted - by two very different authors.  Can you face reality?
author: Erin Lee
